Package gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.model

Class PlanOfActionAndMilestones

java.lang.Object
gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.model.AbstractOscalInstance
gov.nist.secauto.oscal.lib.model.PlanOfActionAndMilestones
All Implemented Interfaces:
gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IBoundObject, IOscalInstance
@MetaschemaAssembly(formalName="Plan of Action and Milestones (POA&M)", description="A plan of action and milestones which identifies initial and residual risks, deviations, and disposition, such as those required by FedRAMP.", name="plan-of-action-and-milestones", moduleClass=OscalPoamModule.class, rootName="plan-of-action-and-milestones", remarks="Either an OSCAL-based SSP must be imported, or a unique system-id must be specified. Both may be present.") public class PlanOfActionAndMilestones extends AbstractOscalInstance implements gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IBoundObject
A plan of action and milestones which identifies initial and residual risks, deviations, and disposition, such as those required by FedRAMP.
